content: Read: 'The little bird can fly high.' What can the bird do?
subject: Reading
explanation: The text says the bird 'can fly high.'

content: Read: 'Dad went to work in his blue car.' How did Dad go to work?
subject: Reading
explanation: The text says 'in his blue car.'
